About Me

I am a retired software developer and IT manager with over 40 years of experience in the semiconductor and telecommunications industries, including Ford Micro Electronics, Cypress Semiconductor, IBM and Comcast.

About My Blog

I infrequently write about technical issues, home brewing and the depredations of The State.

To set up a RSS feed, copy the URL by hovering over the RSS feed icon on the lower right hand side of this page.

For a complete list of my blog entries, click on the RSS feed icon.

Blog content varies. You could look in the tags page to view the various subjects on my radar.

I donâ€™t do Blog Comments. If you see anything interesting, please feel free to contact me.

About This Site

This is version 4.0 of my web site. It is based upon the Astro framework with the Tailwind CSS integration.

The site theme is based upon Nordlys, created by FjellOverflow.

My Manifesto

I believe that the rights of the individual are more important than the goals of the collective.

I believe that the biggest impediment to human progress is always The State.

I believe in the Golden Rule.

I believe that it is better to tell the truth than a lie. I believe it is better to be free than to be a slave. And I believe it is better to know than to be ignorant.

H. L. Mencken
